* First you must choose a Google account to which synchronize your applications information (The apps info will be saved in a new task list called "SaveMyAppsDefaultList" in your account, you can later access this list on your browser by accessing your GMail account).

 * How to save/delete apps:

 1- Choose an app (or a group of them) by checking or un-checking the checkboxes on the right side.

 2- Press the corresponding button (located on the top) to the action you want to perform on the chosen apps ("Save Apps" or "Remove Apps").

 * References:
\nIndicates that the information of the app listed next to it is already saved in your Google account.
\nIndicates that the information of the app listed next to it is NOT saved in your Google account.

* Extra functionality:

 1- Want to refresh the apps list? Sure, just go to the options menu and press the "Refresh" button.

 2- Want to share one or more apps with your friends? No problem, just choose them (by checking the checkboxes on the right side), then go to the options menu and press the "Share" button, after that choose the app you want to use to share the information (Messaging, GMail, etc.) and use it.

 * What will come:

 	I have several new features in mind that I'll be adding to the app as soon as I have the time to work on them so stay tuned :-).

 * Feedback:

 	If you have any suggestions, complaints or whatever about the app you can contact me by email at cool.apps.android@gmail.com
